##  LiveOne's (NASDAQ: LVO) Drumify Produces Lead Single for Wizkid's Album 'Morayo,' Achieving 100 Million Streams in First 48 hours, Adding to LVO’s growing Publishing Catalog

11/26/2024

Download the PDF version PDF Format (opens in new window)

**"Morayo" Became the Highest Streamed Album Debut Ever for an African Artist**

**Recent Releases from Splitmind Include Major Collaborations with GloRilla, Brent Faiyaz, KYLE, Russ, and Blxst**

**Drumify Achieves Record Revenues for October**

**Drumify to Launch First Generative A1 Platform for Beats and Sounds with Seekr and Intel Partnership**

LOS ANGELES, Nov. 26, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LiveOne, Inc. (NASDAQ: LVO), a leader in the entertainment landscape, is thrilled to announce its subsidiary Splitmind has executive produced the lead single for Wizkid’s new album “Morayo,” which has achieved 100 million streams in the first 48 hours since release.

**About LiveOne, Inc.**

LiveOne, Inc. is an award-winning, creator-first, music, entertainment, and technology platform delivering premium experiences and content worldwide. With subsidiaries like Slacker Radio and PodcastOne, LiveOne has garnered accolades for its innovative approach, including the Best Live Moment award by Digiday for the "Social Gloves" PPV Event.

**About Splitmind**

Founded by Aidan “Halfway” Crotinger in 2020, Splitmind is a Los Angeles-based music collective of producers and writers from all over the world, including Grammy-winning, multi-platinum producer Jakik. Splitmind’s catalog includes 40,000 copyrights and 2 billion streams. Splitmind provides an infrastructure that allows creatives to share sounds while retaining their royalties - paving the path to give producers long-term ownership of their copyrights. Splitmind is a majority-owned subsidiary of [LiveOne](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=1JwxCIQ4gB9AuWJiRKqR-oUOYXrwNvfY-BlT2k1DpKfyT2FEovvU4GWCzloUeWCunjnM3jLFfyBHXG8O4nkJfgDuXx609WyjSMpKYxnA-CPzuwtHhKjAjFCuWcYsoEfD6Z2MozLLVqOlQqU_3npt1LJyOr1oaR0TncROjpWoqqpwAKpf8Tbmh4Pyk152gdwJbzOOlGaWZBE2xTXtN2SruFmPQ63_q74DoPcpy2_ef4SK2ZaCQQLzkcMgVrxfHBjVeXUEHyMntYtk-B3pMNMfUwMScs00244b3aTdP8MGrPSysW7A5h3nWjFPCsMwIEA5532nWg80PRmVFL4LiKv-NXVNir39wmNIkuPF-lMk-wVc-BcVU6WbE61JM3baD8nPJHu3ckWO_2evBtDavufV9SvPVzgd7LC9LUqQ0lflcyObvD5gzGFHqZDeQIQXtye72eccm-xv2xcnGu_RykWl6rL-jx1qyKf4tQXSlq_onL5s2JbOF-KdnmzWrb3dkjMRGrcD3jtXKMbs_iKKVWRM5qcuSbS1rm2k6WaizK-XbXEhibLL-1IcJaZfAIAgm9lvsmdl7epR2Ot3ZQVtxcnoJCKKJ7Zymwe5X24Fhd_PUUGMyDxGVxl5_D1DYqeAj_t8TwimVKi85bBSBn5koFvS3kWXHnXFOVo3wpCDHXD_Qmbd54p5ZocVoiU7W0Hx7w4R__6bf2iYZdDNWVZuGnsnORNdU6og5e6ir9jfenn6gtkk-9epWb7AfYJm9gjvCPxnSO58uVfDa-vkOh6wW7FSCiiJdW9wug1ZE1wJrJHgsetwBqEh8Qhl395ts4TOJMgFNU2zozdw4XXzT12IiQuErWA9sHGM6LfjJW9fXC2ZfjDBN8z8q-RUCqeR2C7sHL_IBvr0ugvpnlW_mczkIa79irFgE35BSK7QIc7YLGeFcSkEtkPhqA9qOcuSR8kOGRtvZ3p3lgOcH6_gN9MwlylqLubTPiip8muCHeKeCjhUEOJXVhcvAORZdpIZX-2UAkhO_5XFvqxramSNQw-rahvCiFVoQdREntf8RjYbIRRCNCivSi5s1PjQ7yx_PPh2fdtD4NYV0ujZCD50dcc1WNxUPNDcVmvV8tvM6A9M6aYjodI3CbM8lsWEhA6-6sb15hkcsKIglpUnPYU0IJf0YDVnZtX35EQxnX0RWK9Ibuvbu6IITB8XR_2tqJHSKxOIT_rpyT5OK8nNRZoTNQAbj15kyV47dYACM1bNcNSupCQuHFFjXoAUgOPNz7X4qfG04N6OujSZx21ahUUzw4aYeFMtgN9J3VPCpq_csxIOZ7YY8ZN86q_8UvnHwwe_YSVe_0UuXW_GQwXYEqVl-thmfd5fAtrBGtQt1v9ecLp3Vx6Ax_ux37Ik7c8W-3IQt78csvicJwaKPtmRlTKJIoqS3WwBOMVriiCoa-zwQg4tDqjMZAwmAGKpA_xzdAD_IAcRHNJc3vxN9xZTvxgSqRRYCBvaRU8nashAGga-UGdP9DKrYjrtz3l-nAjENyoIJcSXJQ9e7Qjdz7EQ_5tMB6nbzN_PSJU6fqW-WKuY63_vMJsGe7mFo-DyLiKR0cJUCmQknlFkzHZOI7ah8zwdAY2rFyt7GiOIuGub3S7KlU-H2F1_9KbFYCBSp9XLSuslijDvsPTJvgHhMuKXhFkisoZES-w-tTrZk1NsZkrb3B_4h4SKE8qcJ1WT7jty6-dLvnqEm8cu) (NASDAQ: LVO) and was acquired by LiveOne in 2023.

##  NY Times Best Selling Author and Reality Television Personality Stassi Schroeder Moves Stassi Podcast to PodcastOne (PODC) in Seven Figure Deal

11/12/2024

Download the PDF version PDF Format (opens in new window)

![Stassi_CoverPhoto_2000x2000_pc1bug](https://ml.globenewswire.com/Resource/Download/d744871f-bd9c-4ca6-b596-aefc4e9baae3/stassi-coverphoto-2000x2000-pc1bug.png)

**_Stassi_****Move Strengthens Platform’s Existing Female-Focused Slate of Programming**

**49th New Podcast Joining PodcastOne’s Platform in 2024, 189 Total Podcasts**

LOS ANGELES, Nov. 12, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- [PodcastOne](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=x2KjW6swLEnXUk6g0qa5ErG7flLdIwr3TSgMa6r3WULNNry5Pof9AFy4-64aT_NPy65L-Bs9epEiwLf1UjJHDtog_i90F9abMGZSlNsfopdFBAFuSGBEmGcacHw1uo6knhVXEwr0ne2GToSgwhT-xKGZUFFP6_YbbnDx1bQVcOCerLOVw52vMaIoyABtxwu4tjxGPKkY2wvqpmMgdajpqOrGyc-ddpk_S01S261E98T_qb8kyiqEPx2FY9NyCRW1HJaPhsO844CLDMGXXwi1TdPmRAWCEVJ84WYVcvWBqmSnSZQTHr76dbuEB5Xn3bGkh-7kpe7uLR3jJjNR7NV9WIxlhHhR9a2Mz14PUdYyTmwSuBM10dsNFgYhAFR0LWyvCfe3t6vjnEoaYXlldXR8SoGLtY4twasddDNlIWI6ylPxHjQ6L1HWD3LKPvHCHOn2GHyk5A6E2wg3ne27cntq-RC_LATPP_daP3-NcN-Ypu99KGUp4SQ43Zfw7zdAsj0ytg9chZNB-3j4N9fhSUg_0v5Jf0LxD_gF7jB3r78UR41659kDH_Ef-Spo1gYGzume) (NASDAQ: [PODC](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=jJUJfzL5V2_ePimJvwZyAtif-XjLmUnhMKH-Vd33IBUULblUQ9HGCP_IiyOuPZUAABYrEBKMXe75HeXVnWDKezuUcerPwtXUG3-O7pA__EaJXpZ-nLLkQN9-NLkrqTGnPwoKNjoa0vXV8wiiMdo44-jZgL4iPrYKZQfoCnMUJo_RBqQ9GjywP4AnZkazGmIVzRM-TaByZcAV18c2LrG-Fg==)), a leading podcast platform and a subsidiary of [LiveOne](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=2s8OuVnkVGvFyVcvWOmd6b-KLcqOMrUCaGcS9BTx0dOTir0XbXLcMFX_Tzskhectg-Rk8HAqN8h5ffeeCi4eCFuwX2rsTFK_zTVD2-2uE3EQAvtRBnermockbByg_jYkJWX9D2zFlZ-6o5-wHIFH7gqiPvDxmKasLoYzjy6fpyfK2QXfaxCMm7DdkIClUEqXVtesNoJPi56_szVIm47cuiG6sOxDBwbo4_26F-vEejIVNF-RQIFnd3aEcafKfHd3gGjXKrgpnkfQuSB63plYfRDSSZG3EGNny0GpkpKZfqy_JibOodErMCi38qmMq0U6uCq67pxUjyubMKSoQRAP5uOFZr-5fmsUQhjMbn-d-H6YVtxu3TyWdcVgLUFTbUDZZfsWpWgDq7A3ZBSbOLRIji_Dk-ZWPT3gcKnkcIERotKXOzym81Hg_M_3wfNe6-NphHv4RPj_6ASJlAHG88U2FjGEOdaHtO-x6ZWpxcpjDjuz7ql_Bnie5VKjcgtyhSXuBkNXAD19qRVqNHeIJVv4UqIMCYRcuuAe8FCCDb9s3dSw1ZEJ_wPSNOHlww5C-CVf) ([NASDAQ: LVO](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=9RNrlcfQ2yS1D3C5wLVgxaSNLNl4zoJRuWkUJHkI9Em3F5Ps1FVmR_JV_I_5lbao5LGGBDfnGnzFnGE3O7mGwQ==)), announced today the acquisition of the highly acclaimed _Stassi_ podcast, hosted by bestselling author and reality television personality Stassi Schroeder in a multiyear seven figure deal. The podcast addition strengthens and grows PodcastOne's existing commitment to providing engaging content tailored to women.

On the _Stassi_ podcast, Stassi shares candid stories, personal reflections, and her token commentary on everything from pop culture to relationships to style, and beyond. With each episode, listeners get an intimate glimpse into Stassi's world, with her closest friends, as she navigates the highs and lows of life with humor, wit, and unapologetic honesty. Known for her candid conversations and authentic storytelling, Stassi has cultivated a devoted audience that resonates with her relatable experiences and insights.

“We are excited to welcome Stassi and her podcast to our network,” said PodcastOne’s President and Co-Founder Kit Gray. “Her ability to connect with women through relatable content and genuine conversations makes her a powerful voice in the podcasting landscape. PodcastOne, with our talent-focused approach, is the perfect partner for Stassi and her team to grow the podcast’s fanbase and reach.”

“I’m beyond thrilled to join the team at PodcastOne for this next chapter,” said Stassi Schroeder. “I’ve always been all about real talk and sharing life’s crazy highs and lows with you all and after almost a decade of podcasting, it’s amazing to have a committed partner that understands what makes this journey so fun. They’re all about authentic storytelling, which is exactly what I want to keep bringing to my listeners. I’m excited to show you all what we’re working on to continue to make this show and its content even more entertaining and unexpected.”

_Stassi_ has captivated audiences for over nine years, remaining one of the highest-rated podcasts across platforms. Schroeder was one of the first talents to evolve her podcast into a live show in 2019, when she introduced the _Straight Up with Stassi Live_ tour, selling out shows across the U.S. within minutes. The success of her live shows resulted in the _Bougie Bus Tour_ in 2020 and the _Mommy Dearest Tour_ in 2023, which also included sold out markets. In addition to her ventures with the podcast, it was also recently announced that Schroeder will be returning to reality TV with her own half-hour docu-comedy series in the works at Hulu.

The acquisition will enhance PodcastOne’s mission to champion female voices in the podcasting space. As part of this collaboration, Stassi will also be integrated into PodcastOne's extensive promotional and marketing initiatives across a multitude of genres with plans to explore live shows, merchandising and adaptations.

_Stassi_ joins PodcastOne’s full roster of top ranked podcasts which includes programming across top genres such as news, comedy, true crime and society and culture, featuring shows such as _LadyGang, Karma and Chaos_ , _Coffee Convos, Varnamtown, The Prosecutors, Court Junkie, The Jordan Harbinger Show, Off the Vine with Kaitlyn Bristowe, The Adam Carolla Show_ , _Camp Counselors,_ and _The Schaub Show._

**About PodcastOne**[PodcastOne](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=x2KjW6swLEnXUk6g0qa5EoO-VA4PG57IGP8VOuvcW91Rha4Ewt4HAasgCFHjqu8vyB9UZ_HhfYwX88p3r0nCb3BgnB78bEKaFCnn4-5Zew3YAD_qTWkCU8PhPJqQF7WULJ9pw5Dgt6LLF6XUpJh0GyXfW9mP3N2dD0iJQuzhy0Z0v8nzU_ccU--zzxQyeEG2GQaI-UnOubKds3NmZQYZCwZpSB-RCEon6D0QOqITqb3lh3BRjbCyDLhpv8z8z_oLSbyh-BPnhzFk9GXN_h3l6PHSHBofJUif9zTp0RtWl7qJRcWg42nnNUJzQSlumdLwj6KvZHM0FV51MxnakW9kL0CtDahNc2YTRhTgDP7mDIWkHextL4FwzK4MfBTOwdK_U0HoULV427gis8nclrnbCHUC2a8gIV_o3sG9Ff4CTBY=) (NASDAQ: PODC) is a leading podcast platform that provides creators and advertisers with a full 360-degree solution in sales, marketing, public relations, production and distribution. PodcastOne has over 2.1 billion downloads per year with a community of 250 top podcasters, including Adam Carolla, Kaitlyn Bristowe, Jordan Harbinger, LadyGang, A&E's Cold Case Files, and Varnamtown. PodcastOne has built a distribution network reaching over 1 billion listeners a month across all channels, including its majority shareholder, LiveOne (NASDAQ: [LVO](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=tFSqdkI41q4ZUzLnWR8toTe4qK5ewVdlm5A4_0iiP0u93vnv2-j7yfKc5QNl2jLeutKRDIjyR37dLR7RTuDeqHpcLS-I-BV7FRRwUFiFjn0QbOL3IqpaUI8DLUzqCz-a)), as well as Spotify, Apple Podcasts, iHeartRadio, Samsung and over 150 shows exclusively available in Tesla vehicles. PodcastOne is also the parent company of [LaunchpadOne](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=_1h6-K8UZLWicVL5QPKxl9_Q1XryQYcQ3V_0aprH9Vj5m1H3pccmcpyxFSAcemlqf88_Cu7E2oflgC6hLIaMix71noWHf20RJZXvCoQeaPZsADw337vo-PEJH-DQgT9aGWV1Q2BfCuD1BPf3fueodW4eF-sAmDxUBC4AO7miK4-RmH9aDVbdfXDBz2ADvoXwc81pb1LPDvTSYKu5zCHgcrwlAw5vy-9DOaWl-teP07MUIoualrWmffH0Jf55pNrJ), an innovative self-serve platform developed to launch, host, distribute and monetize independent user-generated podcasts. For more information, visit [www.podcastone.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=17buo6aCQ1ZSGxU7OMNu31snIVquYo6OWqnWx0O5O0xs6QUiMoTtI12Eg4QCXHd0cJ6Q0njS2RrgkrNYY_tDBVrZm03p81DN6hT-Ul7x7olRQAyDPsmJwYT2HfO1rOEYcvYqHPxByh_umupMCZ7EbGIB0fn0N3SxrrsejFpqbfFcweSXU6pQ5eBmcBmOOFe9trKq-vucFjDG-pU2dmARSBmvgcyM6ZOeuRpB5R62cw3fB5_457JE3fNZ5yT-QZC4JSHgsecOysgd6dXv5wyHRg==) and follow us on [Facebook](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=pxIWwYf286ACUId6uYca5v43M6ANh81RqjCycbKwcgy7kNV1a4SWgeT59etjY4VyEjr_EKrP960fT2p66csoTB56Hjb2eBP04OEa7ITW-XK0QKhySGKLVoOBdJkSBkAZXThRe-oJ8_rTS2sf6RFDln40VKXDir3RRNgbKBFhBN9BjnXPKrGw2hXcN_TuoeAmUWkTsyhTPipAMA4sgfDOniiwjTt_6-FX2ybgR5nvfRs9TSPQ0qMLOS65cWiSSmqS), [Instagram](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=Ub95KYmR2q8uaup40cpPzikq7_56aJgP25hjl8dszigjmxFOqfMFsSproi8rzKkCwUkMgvgcTzJALFXwTdz41x1e6CXkdEdtSkKDzUraV9OQCvXKMD6oDCVnL9U3r5ua0jJ0_HZ-v4clBie5uNW58miRG-aeY_-FCRxpbyE8aXBFYd2kfrLZCbhDdIXFe2e4tj6YxXEDYRzNBflc0P0Jge7aB9Ob3GxZ7sGjjiFpoSvV1HXl-7OxRfJbvhgtKNDw), [YouTube](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=lYp6A4NiAeLSUI11cvLgM3kTCD2YsFmQGBjS4Pi6Dx1KRL0WSaUXGyz8TcaB-IhxSUjSKG5mOZqoos-EvH0PHwaayhE9VP98mebzL3wPE9wnx7lRCyIAEGvZG1vC74JqEQrkS3J2Abk842NOh7E4VslFmD2hw3-_uP4DKapx_ToeN8vOOHitOxdqQKCV3KK2fOxxMACVRy9F6gqwSVN2j0COg5b3OgvOGF0ehubo5rLCSgSTfHYOgfLR2PY_VE2L) and [X](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=paDT4h5Tblhvn9POVZPCBxJGEnJzPsRUL7WLKhhMRX_6Ey2R8uZ8z8ZJsHXZiGPrQOFjs1S_Kv4BhoLb0sf1TZF7HiZ7r4HMi5Lh20QneOnxisEhi6802Lr0Al2H2Y31ry5g6pAb6aVJd8KDJoYgsBE-TE--Ji1WENMMQoIEoussuMDj_Mad4yKMaEPbhubUPhp_4vUwZyj4CAGKnh1dGQ==) at @podcastone.

**About LiveOne, Inc.** Headquartered in Los Angeles, CA, LiveOne (Nasdaq: [LVO](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=u8wqEqunYVUBtwvlKUjUhbj_8Ub3aV9xTcTZ7UqTPguhfdrZ3pdD5nsYiFRlFr2jKi1sM-MbTnVWN2egOEnXEfjyb_Y_5y4v2l0WM0nX9q9xLryhWnN-MQe0wrtHOrAZger3SjCWc4_-2izXD11O_LutDYRDOkViv0ZBvf-tHoWW9ysRCE03SICKiG4A-FHOYajoxAlM7TZ5Zq03bM-f-wy_83XWH7hFE6k7H2-hUVva_6nSmdINA7VG-HdVT9gE4WqvBzoCxKHUSQoaLpByK7hdbo3Csi7uZ2aaecCvj2joX_qTtcozRtpXLUMCqjK2apnJ0Oe8XOmggx9dy9btG-VftOsBHBEfmOldadC-Za4o7gzBNZ1NKtUi8jUDhMQuD4AoLeWoqoKZSm73mQwE6kzozJFQRhGdHSxwR3fy_cA6EmdPn9BttuNxQnvhYJGWYcq8y-65cvTGfy42ozyXOdMgFcjfMj9SXPc6O0JAPmD8k09AMY-u0RMuF0iA3GJV5imsM3BGbzYZFMf-SgfduPFhfEkBAbBwl6ZhdbyYGENzDXm5XTdRHIf6_9MInfDRMaKkMaGBXEmQXc2JjzHMCEUslF9NZHiRL7TP-U4MWkYYBTQzf0dCQNM_TywF8SAolo6aV-BtXrJ_aPqpyNvctioBnhX1TSrrQK4AZhZ80cfK6Twvc35keLqLPwX3OVgbEeE9WdpNwH5LgiqX1TcWQtVUnx1fvXGFBdIJRQYJUJRry2j2qwPc3cLaRQ-zXlncNQEP9bQDJis2hxr6LEFHQ4mFtJkQoLCuAYhYhWPkPTzfk4fQ2SjDdXPLfFKfBhpuytmE5tKLEyYVIrTe7wncMg4y8UmyHQNegMx_R91LokRr3Vyxj92qrBBD17FEWxWV4rYS3vsJFpPPz_-_2Fpj9kRcuBboFHRfo8vJXpZ8MvA=)) is an award-winning, creator-first, music, entertainment, and technology platform focused on delivering premium experiences and content worldwide through memberships and live and virtual events. LiveOne's subsidiaries include Slacker Radio, PodcastOne (Nasdaq: [PODC](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=jJUJfzL5V2_ePimJvwZyAjaU03JDa0obWQ2N1ZhPqos_ZKqpn9sbtGFkLJK67U2S_M7GUcS2H5WuIdnH5-caLA==)), PPVOne, CPS, LiveXLive, DayOne Music Publishing, Drumify and Splitmind. LiveOne is available on iOS, Android, Roku, Apple TV, Spotify, Samsung, Amazon Fire, Android TV, and through STIRR’s OTT applications. For more information, visit [liveone.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=Rqwco4CBifhZg_xlc_NCr62z-IltyfJmkhrqqMWQwq9S7usSdOsX10t3fFO181QVrWzHa8Pt93v7ciU29uRkqQ==) and follow us on ##  LiveOne (NASDAQ: LVO) and KYLE Launch and Live Stream his New Album

11/07/2024

Download the PDF version PDF Format (opens in new window)

**Event to Showcase 4 Pillars of Growth for LVO: Streaming, Music Publishing, Music Production and Celebrity Products**

  * **_LiveOne Subsidiary Splitmind Executive Produced the Album_**
  * ** _LiveOne Entered $100B Coffee Market Acquiring Smyle Coffee in Partnership with KYLE in 2024_**
  * ** _Music Fans Can Live Stream “LVL 1: At Least It Was Fun” Album Listening Party on Thursday, November 7th at 10pm PT on_**[** _LiveOne.com_**](https://c212.net/c/link/?t=0&l=en&o=3562469-1&h=3088500886&u=http%3A%2F%2Fliveone.com%2Fwiscansinfest&a=LiveOne.com)



**_KYLE has 4.5M Monthly Spotify Listeners, 6+M Social Media Followers_**

**_Splitmind Music Collective has Over 2B Streams across 100+ Major Label Releases and Increased Revenues 300% YOY_**

**_LiveOne is Dominating Live Streaming with Impressive Milestones:_**

  * **_200+ Million Viewers Reached_**
  * ** _5 Billion Engagements with Fans Across 220 Countries_**
  * ** _Streamed Over 360 Events_**



**_LiveOne has Streamed 3200 Artists, including:_**

  * **_Taylor Swift_**
  * ** _Adele_**
  * ** _Justin Beiber_**
  * ** _Bruce Springsteen_**
  * ** _Drake_**
  * ** _Post Malone_**
  * ** _Olivia Rodrigo_**



LOS ANGELES, Nov. 07, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LiveOne Brands, a division of LiveOne, Inc. (NASDAQ: LVO), a leader in the entertainment landscape, is thrilled to announce its subsidiary Splitmind has executive produced rapper KYLE’s new album “LVL 1: At Least It Was Fun.” Executive produced by Steven Shaeffer & KYLE, the project is a collaborative effort between Grammy Winning Producer Steven Shaeffer and Global Billboard charting artist KYLE. The album releases on November 8th, 2024.

**About LiveOne, Inc.**

LiveOne, Inc. is an award-winning, creator-first, music, entertainment, and technology platform delivering premium experiences and content worldwide. With subsidiaries like Slacker Radio and PodcastOne, LiveOne has garnered accolades for its innovative approach, including the Best Live Moment award by Digiday for the "Social Gloves" PPV Event.

**About KYLE**

Kyle Thomas Harvey, known mononymously as Kyle and SuperDuperKyle, is an American rapper, singer, songwriter, and actor from Ventura, California. He is best known for his 2016 breakout single "iSpy", which peaked at number 4 on the Billboard Hot 100. He has 5 million monthly listeners on Spotify, 2 million+ subscribers on Youtube and 1.8M Instagram Followers, 1.5M followers on TikTok.

**About Splitmind**

Founded by Aidan “Halfway” Crotinger in 2020, Splitmind is a Los Angeles-based music collective of producers and writers from all over the world, including Grammy-winning, multi-platinum producer Jakik. Splitmind’s catalog includes 40,000 copyrights and 2 billion streams. Splitmind provides an infrastructure that allows creatives to share sounds while retaining their royalties - paving the path to give producers long-term ownership of their copyrights. Splitmind is a majority-owned subsidiary of [LiveOne](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=4vTBbMcqjvWfAT6pQND8fqA27dkpBom-gF7RJCqCtrsEoLjwxLdWB1SVrEAmkrsb2y5tOBYrw0d28dgIjSXil29yzfY0lT173byz4HudHY3gZJDQjJbm6OxOBc8HQwdpyqSJBbOmQzW-gepSp5lIAO-dKPNupTIwMC-8CK-4kIJYYCeg62VKtwZU5aDlmcYH-_-Bt-5NHAtQskuj4upYDGpbDEN_6vctLC5iaAWyiFv_hwEvV6W-kcDC9mLyfy3tdyApv0udSqy7L68xChdj1GNiL0mQyCos5baYKCrlMc73iKmRQdcLJJc_8AGABGH9S3lxE59s9R9DUWjAgLuSsk5R77ExT4o3N0yHeLl1ZlMCMStExTxGSXkHrGpKgWcAXMIMO-bOag8tLRKfuDCGyOtwGcQlCgrKu_hgdNIAaGdHbljPvULPWFOUp6Q-Km9e7teRV7R8HasTAPjnmqR1U5wXihJ4b8Vew7i1FsnNWsnGYGiZ-gycS_p3e19xU8mLrBOcueTLh27UP9tN2rWsscko-fJwxtXHy2HRiZabobqt0nyn79tt0QaY89vXmUenAgO1ulFTcabBy6myxDI_7BgDxtqjIF0BzGb3t3f14hxska1mfpbpKDoqQQFFjIAdaOpRTXFHDyLrlHm3yH9fwXD2xiVPSyTro4GovMstlUUbzibvY_Y2XWo6BZHjFLWD_dkoDuOQvcnaCTr7ym_SB4InMx90A8XIPdZ6ee1_QjiYp_tv499TSINJNZvycUHIDFZuvb2CmFfeHR41XMw0JDw3N53LjXxgBh3w_WcWud9Nf8hyFWF-nAfigoXYdRJqucUaYO5u1gvLwkAfBWHLtQu-R-DGJw4Z7yG3xL8HCEs0NwdskQrYqlHiyWM4VwyCZXSZLnkm8XAmPgWvSg0n9LFVkCcSVnmnIuXazCj9qhxajQdnTUmHJuduIsTW_XqkqRRAh5gDk8buJZnoPopRFxYx4brWTTOOviqEdSw40Tz-veOusOXQeihVrgesM2YLGaMA4h3dAZSuuAgxldfMRO2m_bI5R6obk0ow-8UJRQ5L4A_-woSL-d6m8cE1eX9brNaLb5BpfLPVGw_D3zTx_d8B8utIBMkrUudMmjM9DgHmHi8d4-WJGM2z-V3uk0tsLGSBXwv1F2T7H7Uq7IBE5KDR5H7Bw6a7kMymOU0qpRJXFcKi1n3cWejbn7rnQf5b) (NASDAQ: LVO) and was acquired by LiveOne in 2023.
